mapper.insert:
insert into public.password_view(name, password, description, account_number, websit, like_status, category, last_view_time, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.accountNumber}, #{entity.websit}, #{entity.likeStatus}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.lastViewTime}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into public.password_view(name, password, description, account_number, websit, like_status, category, last_view_time, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.accountNumber}, #{entity.websit}, #{entity.likeStatus}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.lastViewTime}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update name = values(name) , password = values(password) , description = values(description) , account_number = values(account_number) , websit = values(websit) , like_status = values(like_status) , category = values(category) , last_view_time = values(last_view_time) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
